channel.title: A few Server coding Questions
channel.description:
[center][b][u]Hello, I am working on my first server called Tribe PK.[/u][/b] *If any coder's or hoster's would like to apply I have an opening*[/center]
Q: How do i make it so when you click on a portal it teleports you there? Status: [b]Not Answered[/b]
Q: How do i add a wall insted of a door, so no one can enter that room? Status: [b]Not Answered[/b] [center]*How do i add walls?*[/center]
Q: How do i change the starting point of a newcomer? Status: [b]Answered[/b] -Thanks fl3tch pker-
Q: How do i change the spawning point when someone dies? Status: [b]Not Answered[/b][br]
Q: How do i make npc's spawn on the second floor of a house insted of the first? Status: [b]Not Answered[/b]
Q: How do i add objects like bookcases, ect.? Status: [b]Not Answered[/b]
Q: How do i make it so that you get xp from *def*searching hay(299=id), *atk*attacking dummies(823), and *str*searching hay(300=id)? Status: [b]Not Answered[/b]

item.title: A few Server coding Questions
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

Thanks, do you know the answer?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 08:11:56 AM[/size][hr]anyone?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 08:36:49 AM[/size][hr]hello?
[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 08:51:45 AM[/size][hr]Hello?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 10:32:36 AM[/size][hr]hello?

item.title: A few Server coding Questions
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

How do i add book case,and how do i add walls,are petty much the same thing so if you get answer for one,you can use that answer for the other one.

Read full topic

item.title: A few Server coding Questions
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

Thanks, can anyone else help me with other questions

Read full topic

item.title: A few Server coding Questions
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

go to autospawn.cfg file. find the coord(x.Y) of second floor,and use this code,

spawn = 588	2950	3387	0	2952	3390	2948	3385	1	Falador Mace Shop

the first 3 are the npc id,and the next 4 are x coord and the next 4 are the y coord.

Read full topic

how i make a case? for the portal?

item.title: A few Server coding Questions
item.dc:creator: @fl3tch_pker fl3tch pker
item.description:
@fl3tch_pker wrote:

ummm hey this whar u do for making spawn point for when someone dies go into player and search this
// initial x and y coordinates of the player scroll down tell u see sometin like this teleportToX youll see 2 cordints edit the top 1 the first is x cords and next y cords edit them to were u want and for portal u make a case
make 1 portal add cords in the case and then edit the x and y cords

Read full topic
